main event: A civilian reported observing a cigar-shaped object with three diamond-shaped windows for about 2 minutes over Greenlawn, Long Island, New York on October 21, 1956.
interesting points: The object shot away in a straight path to the east.
The witness was interviewed by the Suffolk County Air Force Station, but they believed he wanted to get his name in the news media.
The witness had seen several UFOs before.
The object made a whistling noise and its color alternated between white, red, blue, and green.
The witness could not determine the precise size of the object, but estimated it would have covered most of a match head held at arm's length.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with three diamond-shaped windows
